title: Track fault causing service disruption on Thomson–East Coast Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 汤姆森-东海岸线轨道故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan trek menyebabkan gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Thomson–East Coast
title_translations.ta: தாம்சன்-கிழக்கு கடற்கரை பாதையில் சேவை இடையூறுக்கு காரணமான பாதையில் ஏற்பட்ட தவறு

updates.text: [TEL]: Trains service is progressively resuming. Trains travelling towards Woodland North will resume service at Orchard. No additional travelling time. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
[TEL]: Due to a track fault, trains travelling towards Woodlands North will not stop at Orchard station. Additional travelling time of 10 minutes.
